t: Amazon International shopping and shipping made easy
s: International shipping made easy through the Amazon Global program. Amazon Global ships millions of products to over 100 countries worldwide. Simplify customs, track your purchases door-to-door and no hidden imports fees.

t: Amazon FBA (Fulfillment by Amazon) | Sell on Amazon
s: Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA) is a fulfillment service that allows businesses to use Amazon to store, pick, pack, and ship customer orders. You send products to Amazon and we take care of the rest. Learn more about FBA.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores help build brand awareness by showcasing your brand and product catalog on your own Amazon web address. You can create a Brand Store at no additional cost—with no coding necessary.

t: Free Shipping by Amazon - Amazon Customer Service
s: Orders shipping to an eligible destination with at least the stated minimum threshold of eligible items, qualify for Free Shipping by Amazon.

t: Global Shipping Rates - Amazon Customer Service
s: The cost to ship items from each product category varies by item, shipment, and shipping option.

t: Seller Shipping Rates - Amazon Customer Service
s: When you purchase a new, refurbished, used, or collectible item from a seller at Amazon Marketplace, you pay immediately, online. Included in your payment is a pre-calculated fee for shipping.

Ship Fulfilled by Merchant (FBM) orders with Amazon Buy Shipping. Amazon Buy Shipping makes it easy to purchase and print shipping labels in one place. Get great rates for USPS, FedEx, UPS, Amazon Shipping, and other major carriers while enjoying increased protection for refunds and delivery claims.
